solution_line_template: The total time we spent going to school is {time_to_gate} minutes + {time_gate_to_building} minutes = <<{time_to_gate}+{time_gate_to_building}={total_time_to_building}>>{total_time_to_building} minutes.
We have {total_allowed_time} minutes - {total_time_to_building} minutes = <<{total_allowed_time}-{total_time_to_building}={time_left_to_room}>>{time_left_to_room} minutes left not to be late.
